original_text: Neither in the days of the judges who led Israel nor in the days of the kings of Israel and the kings of Judah had any such Passover been observed.
korean_text: 사사가 이스라엘을 다스리던 시대부터 이스라엘 여러 왕의 시대와 유다 여러 왕의 시대에 이렇게 유월절을 지킨 일이 없었더니

sentences.original_text: Neither in the days of the judges
nor in the days of the kings of Israel
had any such Passover been observed
